snippet.title: Pathologic 2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Pathologic 2 is an open world survival horror game set in a town being consumed by plague. As the only sane medic around, it's up to you to save everyone you can. 

The Announcement Trailer is made from real gameplay recorded from Pathologic 2's PAXWest demo. 

http://pathologic-game.com - sign-up for the alpha
http://store.steampowered.com/app/505230 - Wishlist & Follow on Steam
https://discord.gg/hyQcyev - join our discord
